components/account/orders-list:
{{#each orders}}
{{#if items.0.type '===' 'giftcertificate'}} {{else}} {{/if}}

{{lang 'account.orders.list.order_number' number=this.id}}

{{lang 'account.orders.list.product_details' num_products=this.items.length cost=this.total.formatted}}

Status: {{this.status}}

{{lang 'account.orders.order_placed' }}: {{this.date}}

{{lang 'account.orders.last_update' }}: {{this.last_update_date}}

{{#if this.return_url}}
{{lang 'account.orders.return_items' }}
{{/if}}
{{/each}}
